blog.name: prubbs

blog.description: A bog where I talk about Batman slashfic and porn and bad ukulele music.

summary: And I Was Always There - Chapter 1 - dnawhite76, Prubbs - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Acade
body:
And I Was Always There - Chapter 1 - dnawhite76, Prubbs - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Acade

Do you like BNHA? Do you like pain? Do you like to read cute things about cute people who hide their feelings for fear of them not being reciprocated?

This fic is for you.

“Katsuki Bakugou was convinced that he never needed help from anyone, even after a rogue villain shattered his arms in a fly by attack. But with Izuku Mydoria was his emergency contact, he is forced to accept the the help whether he wants it or not.”

A story in for chapters, posts every Thursday!

summary: How to Stop a Quirk (Preface-Subject A)
title: How to Stop a Quirk (Preface-Subject A)
body:
Panda’s Notes: It’s National Tickle Day, and I’m not late! ^^ So enjoy part one of Deku pulling a prank on his friends.

 

80% of today’s population has what is called a Quirk: a superpower or physical attribute reminiscent of those found in comic books or fantasy stories. Quirks are split into three most basic categories: Emitter quirks; Transformative quirks; and Mutant quirks.

We (A collection of students from Class 1-A at U.A. High School) are hereby using this as a log for a minor experiment that shall be conducted on our fellow students to answer the following question:

Do we currently hold the universal method to stopping Quirks?

Notes: Mutant Quirks are complete and permanent physical alterations to the human body that their owners are generally born with; as such, they cannot be stopped or erased.

–Izuku Midoriya

“Even your notes ramble on, Midoriya.” Uraraka giggled lightly as she and Iida held the notebook.

Deku blushed faintly, rolling his eyes as he smiled. “It isn’t that bad.” He argued. “You guys are still going to help, right?”

Iida grinned, closing the book and handing it back to Izuku. “You don’t really think that framing this like some kind of experiment will really hide the fact that it’s a prank, do you?” He asked softly.

“Be quiet; you wouldn’t have said yes if I didn’t, Mr. Straight-Lace.” He teased, standing on his toes to ruffle the class-rep’s hair. “And it’ll be fun, right?”

“Of course!” Ochaco nodded. “And I think I know who we can get first.”

——–

Subject A: Eijirou Kirishima (Hero Course: 1-A)

Quirk: Hardening (Transformative)

Subject is able to harden his skin to the consistency of stone, making him able to resist impact or sensation to hardened areas, or deliver stronger punches or kicks.

“Are you absolutely sure you want to train with me of all people?” Iida asked softly as he tied a double knot on his sneakers.

Kirishima stretched his arm across his chest, grinning toothily as he stepped back. “Heck, yeah, Iida!” He said happily. “That kick of yours is awesome! And, well, y’know… Heh, Bakugou’s still nagging me about my reaction time being too slow.”

The class rep smiled, getting to his feet and resting his hands on his hips. “Well, alright, Kirishima. Let’s see what you can handle.”

“Don’t go easy on me, Emergency Exit.” Eijirou taunted playfully, rolling his shoulder one last time. “Bring it o—”

The redhead flinched slightly when Iida’s engines fired and a kick was suddenly being aimed at the side of his head. He just barely managed to block it, though it still hurt like crazy since he hadn’t been able to brace his arm in time. He winced and rubbed his forearm as the class rep backed off.

“Are you alright?” Tenya asked, already worried and running over to check his arm. There was a red bruise forming, but Kirishima flexed his fingers easily and shook him off, that same grin stuck on his face.

“Aw, c’mon, that was just the first one;” Eijirou said happily. “bring it again, I’ll be ready!”

It took a bit more convincing this time, but Iida nodded again and went back to his own position. The next few minutes continued pretty easily, with Kirishima slowly making progress and playfully calling out Tenya whenever he started going easy on him. He got into a rhythm of bracing himself at about the instant Iida’s feet left the ground, and only relaxing after the kick had landed.

“He is getting better.” Izuku murmured to Uraraka, the pair standing under a tree near the training ground.

She nodded with a smile, hands tucked into her pockets. “Should we get him now?”

Deku pulled his notebook and pencil from his bag, along with a small timer. “Definitely. Right when he deflects the next kick.”

Occhaco gave a thumbs-up, and a few seconds later, Iida’s leg was pushed away by Kirishima’s hardened hands. Uraraka slipped up behind him first, pressing her fingers into his sides. He yelped and flinched away, instinctively triggering his quirk and flailing as his sudden lack of gravity sent him floating gently above the ground. Tenya chuckled, moving to catch him and work his own fingers into the redhead’s ribs. Eijirou held his breath as he bit his lip and snickered, trying to struggle out of the class rep’s arms while keeping his torso solid.

Nearby, Deku tapped his chin with his pencil as he observed. He giggled softly before starting the log, walking closer to keep a better watch.

Subject triggered his quirk immediately as the experiment started. Upon observation, the Hardening quirk apparently dulls sensation to a point, but does not nullify it completely.

“Aw, c’mon, Kirishima!” Uraraka teased, her fingers scribbling with Iida’s up and down Eijirou’s torso. “You have to breathe at some point, anyway.”

“I agree; it’d be better for your own health to just let go.” Iida smirked just slightly and moved his hands to dig under Eijirou’s arms. He cried out almost instantly, starting to laugh and pulling his arms in tightly. The skin on his arms and shoulders grew harder, but it faltered much faster than it had before. Deku checked and noted his timer before closing his pencil in the notebook and tucking it into his jacket.

“How about right here?” He asked, reaching up to tickle the redhead’s neck. Kirishima tried to struggle away from them again, laughing brightly as his face started to turn a slightly troubling red. In the same instance, his skin returned to normal; Ochaco alerted them with a teasing goose to their subject’s softened waist.

“Alright, I think we got it.” Izuku said happily, checking his timer again and quickly pulling out his notebook.

Hardening Quirk seems to be entirely dependent on Subject’s breath, its strength deteriorating faster the more he laughs and moves.

Initial Deterioration: 68 seconds

Critical Failure: 214 seconds

Weak spots: Underarms, Neck

“What the hell was that for?” Kirishima giggled as Uraraka released him from her quirk and Iida set him down.

“Just a little experiment.” Deku smiled brightly. “Everyone okay?” He asked, a bit of concern on his face when he noticed Iida flexing his fingers in discomfort.

“A bit sore, but I’m fine. Your Quirk really is quite tough, Kirishima.”

“You have to use the pads of your fingers more than the tips so you don’t jam your nails.” Uraraka explained with a giggle, making poor Kirishima unable to even accept that compliment through his embarrassment. It didn’t help that Deku seemed to be adding that to his notes.

“Am I the only one you’ve done this to?” The redhead asked softly, crossing his arms.

“Well, yes.” Izuku said, flipping through his book. “So far, at least. Hm… Do you think you could help us get our next subject?” He showed Eijirou the pages, tapping lightly where he’d written the name.

“Heh. Oh, definitely.” He chuckled, smiling and patting Iida’s arm. “Same time tomorrow?”

The class rep nodded, and Midoriya sighed with a grin as they were left to make up their own strategy for the next day.

Test Result: Success

In the same instance, his skin returned to normal; Ochaco alerted them with a teasing goose to their subject’s softened waist.

“Alright, I think we got it.” Izuku said happily, checking his timer again and quickly pulling out his notebook.

Hardening Quirk seems to be entirely dependent on Subject’s breath, its strength deteriorating faster the more he laughs and moves.

Initial Deterioration: 68 seconds

Critical Failure: 214 seconds

Weak spots: Underarms, Neck

“What the hell was that for?” Kirishima giggled as Uraraka released him from her quirk and Iida set him down.

“Just a little experiment.” Deku smiled brightly. “Everyone okay?” He asked, a bit of concern on his face when he noticed Iida flexing his fingers in discomfort.

“A bit sore, but I’m fine. Your Quirk really is quite tough, Kirishima.”

“You have to use the pads of your fingers more than the tips so you don’t jam your nails.” Uraraka explained with a giggle, making poor Kirishima unable to even accept that compliment through his embarrassment. It didn’t help that Deku seemed to be adding that to his notes.

“Am I the only one you’ve done this to?” The redhead asked softly, crossing his arms.

“Well, yes.” Izuku said, flipping through his book. “So far, at least. Hm… Do you think you could help us get our next subject?” He showed Eijirou the pages, tapping lightly where he’d written the name.

“Heh. Oh, definitely.” He chuckled, smiling and patting Iida’s arm. “Same time tomorrow?”

The class rep nodded, and Midoriya sighed with a grin as they were left to make up their own strategy for the next day.

Test Result: Success

blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: matchup please?5'4, Female, straight, Infj, pale skin,long dark hair Im quiet,gentle, empathic,philosophic and am playful with...
question: matchup please?5'4, Female, straight, Infj, pale skin,long dark hair Im quiet,gentle, empathic,philosophic and am playful with my friends.lm intelligent but I usually keep to my self,Im a deep thinker and have tons of theories but am very shy with expressing my thoughts,I love stars and astronomy,if I could have a quirk it would be energy manipulation,I have a tendency to see the good in everyone and care deeply for those I dont really know,Im nervous around men(used to have an abusive dad) thx
answer:
I would match you up with Aizawa! He would find it interesting to hear your philosophic thoughts and you two could probably end up having a long conversation on your different philosophical thoughts. You would never have to worry about expressing your thoughts, Aizawa will patiently listen to anything you say to him. Aizawa secretly loves to cuddle with you since your gentle nature is very relaxing to him, especially after a long day of teaching his students. He would love to see you point out stars to him, probably you two wrapped up in sleeping bag as you explain the different constellations to your sleepy boyfriend. He finds it amazing how you can see the good in everyone but, he would tell you to remember to take care of yourself. He is always happy to listen to your anxieties and help your sort through your feelings if you asked for his help.



I hope you enjoyed and have a great day! If you ever need to talk or a friend, feel free to send me a message.

Ophelia

blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: Can I have a male matchup please? I’m 5’2,black hair and brown eyes and counted as short. I’m described as quiet and timid to...
question: Can I have a male matchup please? I’m 5’2,black hair and brown eyes and counted as short. I’m described as quiet and timid to new people.But if your one of my closest friends,be prepared to have some crazy things happen. I’m a nerd and jock at the same time.I love archery,photography and playing the piano.If you can do this matchup,tysm 💓💗💖
answer:
I would match you up with Kirishima! He can understand your shy nature when you first get to know people but, is happy when you’re able to be more yourself around him. He always smiles at your crazy antics and might join in as well. Kirishima can enjoy both you being a nerd and a jock, between watching your favorite t.v. shows or to hiking together. He would love to see your photography and would find it pretty impressive, the same when he hears your playing on the piano. He probably has taken his own pictures of you and most certainly has a picture of you saved as his phone background. Definitely swoons over you and finds it super cool that you do archery, he would love if you could teach him one day.



I hope you enjoyed and have a great day!

Ophelia

summary:
Shigaraki, after playing games for a week straight: Ugh, I need a vacation. Ok, everyone, we're having a vacation!
Dabi: We...
body:
Shigaraki, after playing games for a week straight: Ugh, I need a vacation. Ok, everyone, we're having a vacation!
Dabi: We haven't even done anything in over a week.
Shigaraki: You are literally the only person I've ever met who complains about getting paid to do nothing.
